name: Speed Spell - Miracle Synchro Fusion
text: You can remove 2 Speed Counters; Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster, that lists a Synchro Monster as a Fusion Material, from your Extra Deck, by banishing Fusion Materials listed on it from your field or Graveyard. If this Set card is destroyed by an opponent's card effect and sent to the Graveyard: Draw 1 card.
